content.detailedDescription:
One evening, while i was driving my car (i was with my girlfriend), i saw a large ufo (shaped diamond) with lots of lights and no sound;i stopped my car in the middle of the road (there was none)to observe him...It remained motionless in the sky for 7 minutes, then rotated on itself and then walked away slowly.
i and my girlfriend, during the sighting...We were paralyzed with wonder and amazement. no fear. it 'was a great experience ... a great sense of peace as if the world had stopped.
content.summary: Ufo sighting ( summer 2012 )

content.detailedDescription: This is sometimes hard for people to believe, i sometimes wonder if i believe it myself. i and 4 others were walking into a gravel quarry outside of freeport, il in the summer of 1997. i was the first to notice a really bright light in the west. the others first dismissed the light as a star. for some reason i stayed fixated on the light as we kept walking. soon the light was to bright to ignore and we all started watching it as it approached directly toward us. the object was moving extremely slow, i would measure maybe 5-10 mph. as it approached, what had appeared to be one bright light was now visibly 2 bright lights in the front and smaller lights in the rear and sides. as it came closer i could begin to hear a silent noise that i can only describe as a hovering sound or "quiet mechanical air". what happened next is what makes this too hard to believe. as the craft was almost 15 to 20 feet directly above us, a light came on and projected down straight onto one of the friends i was with. this image will be burned into my brain for the rest of my life. when the beam shined onto him we all began to run and as i looked back i saw him take cover behind a nearby pile of gravel. the light stayed on him as the craft continued to travel east over the treeline and then turned off. this was not a helicopter or an ultra light plane. after the craft had flown past the treeline we looked back in the direction it had come from and saw 4-5 of the same lights heading in seperate directions from west to north. i have reoccurring dreams about the event, and think about it constantly.
content.summary: Myself and 4 others watched as a craft flew extremely slow directly over our heads. the craft turned on a beam of light directly onto one of my friends that stayed as the craft passed over and then turned off.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window at 6 am, having coffee.Venus was clearly visible.  i observed what appeared to be another star directly below it.  i looked closer because i had not remembered seeing it other mornings.  it remained stop so i assumed i was just not very observant.  about a minute later it began to move to the left.  it looked as if it had a small tail trailing it but the trail did not leave traces as a jet does.  it moved left then abruptly started moving up and in a wide arc with the trail visible at all times.  the trail was not visible when it was stationary.  i watched it for about 90seconds then went to a different window for a better view but it was gone by then.. it moved rapidly but i can't judge how far it moved because i couldn't tell how far away it was.  it was far enough that i assumed it was a star at first.  i should add that there is a small municipal airport nearby but only small planes fly in and out and this appeared much further away and indistinct then the planes i see all the time.
content.summary: Appeared directly below venus in morning sky; hovered then moved up and arched away; disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was at some point in my life.
i personally made the first notice.
content.summary: Kind of looked like a cb long bullet

content.detailedDescription: I walked from a parking lot to a business. looking up i saw birds, a jet and what looked like someone released about 50-70 or more balloons.  but all at once they all disappeared then reappeared!  that blew my mind! they were very clear and masking themselves like a swarm of birds! except they were in formations like very intellegent.  they were observing a busy shopping area known as uptown whittier, ca. they were there as soon as i looked up, about 2:15 pm pst!  unreal!  there is absolutely know doubt that these were not of this earth!  disappeared and re-appeared, nothing can do that on earth! these looked very much like the many group sightings on you tube , etc.  like over mexico. they altered their shape to.  they would have been witnesses, but i was to busy looking at them for 15 minutes plus. i had an appointment.  i had to go. they seemed to have left about 2:30 pm......When i came back outside , 30 minutes latter , sky was clear. but! i also think they saw me, the way they moved!  i also , afterwords, saw thousands of white tiny little lights all over and around me!  crazy!  like a flash cube aftershock! i bet my life on it.  i would take a lie detector test! there was more.  i got pix. i took 15 plus but for some reason only captured maybe 10 to 15 . with several frames empty. they were cloaking themselves!  but not all the time.  i am shook up. i hit the mother load. they are here!  i swear to all that is holy. on my childrens lives! i am a professional, good health, good vision, 62 years old.  i'm sure i'll remember even more tonight as i think about the experience.  p.S. the pix are nowhere as clear as in real life. i have a verizon older droid. but it works. i cold see 3d refections of light and dark shadowing around some orbs...........Ga
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw a group of at least 50 to 70 white dull grey balloon like objects come in and out of sight all at once!

content.detailedDescription:
Looking for prospecting sites using google earth, noticed strange looking colors, thought they were birds at first but couldn't find any others in the area. i figured your organization may know what they are...Possibly seen them before. the area is in sw arizona, west of highway 83, at the end of highway 229, and roughly at the 11 o'clock position from sonoita az. attached are screen captures of the area, unknown objects area marked with a question mark on the captures, if i can help with anything more please let me know.

v/r

joe
content.summary: Captured on google earth

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window at 6 am, having coffee.Venus was clearly visible.  i observed what appeared to be another star directly below it.  i looked closer because i had not remembered seeing it other mornings.  it remained stop so i assumed i was just not very observant.  about a minute later it began to move to the left.  it looked as if it had a small tail trailing it but the trail did not leave traces as a jet does.  it moved left then abruptly started moving up and in a wide arc with the trail visible at all times.  the trail was not visible when it was stationary.  i watched it for about 90seconds then went to a different window for a better view but it was gone by then.. it moved rapidly but i can't judge how far it moved because i couldn't tell how far away it was.  it was far enough that i assumed it was a star at first.  i should add that there is a small municipal airport nearby but only small planes fly in and out and this appeared much further away and indistinct then the planes i see all the time.
content.summary: Appeared directly below venus in morning sky; hovered then moved up and arched away; disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At home watching stars and then out of the corner of my eye i notice a boll like of light hover over the rood and i know it is a ufo it just hover and took off to the s.E. at a fast rate.I just wont to know if anyone else have seen this? i have seen this before and reported this.So i research and found nasa has photo of the same ufo around the same time.These photo are the same two of these are ours.The others are nasa.
content.summary: It looks like a sun with a greyish center.

content.detailedDescription:
These photographs were taken on sept. 2nd, 2012 near dusk in the same area after bigfoot researcher eugene and his son recorded a very long bigfoot call at 8:30 p.M. on sept 1st.  on our way home my husband and i were traveling on a road that was at least seven miles long.  we looked up and saw black streaks in the sky.  they were swarms.  i didn���t hear a sound and i know that they weren���t bees or locusts; we thought they were mosquitoes.
 
the swarm only followed the road and the multitude of them ran longer than the length of the entire road (7 miles).    we knew that this was a highly unusual activity and decided to pull the truck over and park. the first photo shows an oncoming swarm.  
  
it is highly unusual for a swarm to form at this time of day. you can see in the first photo that there was one light in the sky or what appeared to be a light in the sky at the time of the photograph.  the second photo shows three lights in the sky.  i turned to the back of our parked truck to photograph what i couldn���t see but what my perceptions allowed me to feel.  the ir on my camera is always on.  i clicked the 3rd image.  these photos were taken on sept. 2nd, 2012 the following evening in the same area after bigfoot researcher eugene and his son recorded a very long bigfoot call on sept. 1st.  the first photo shows the oncoming swarm (in a time period when a swarm shouldn���t have been traveling)  you will see one light in the sky in this shot. the second photo has three lights in the sky.
  
i turned to the back of the parked truck to photograph what i couldn���t see but could feel.  the ir on my camera is always on.  i clicked the 3rd image.  i couldn���t see anything but found it compelling to take the photograph.  i put it on my computer and saw orbs traveling in the beam that the ir on my camera captured.  i also saw the swarm encircling the beam. 

i wanted to know more about insects and i found on the internet that:  insects��� senses vary from mammals, and one of the most important traits they have is their ability to perceive heat.  it appears that the beam was giving off heat.  insects, especially blood drinkers, like mosquitoes, use heat detection as a means of hunting prey, focusing in on big heat sources like big animals.  even though the beam couldn���t be seen with human eyes the insects detected that it was there.  i have an excellent camera.  the first two shots were fine but later on i found out the camera malfunctioned on the beam shot.  i took test shots afterward and the camera functioned perfectly.  the fact that the camera did this seems to support that something was there.  i just wished i could have seen this beam with my naked eye.  if i had i would have put my video on to see if the orbs in the beam were traveling up or down and i would have aimed my camera higher to try to detect where the beam was coming from.
content.summary: Unusual insect behavior led us to photograph a beam

content.detailedDescription: When i came home from work i looked up into the sky and saw a dark triangular craft slowly flying over our house.  it was a cloudy night and the craft was flying just under the clouds.  it was moving too slow to be an airplane.  i didn't hear much noise coming from the craft, the sound was more of a deep bass that i felt more than heard.  the craft flew from south to north until i lost sight of it.  by the time i got to taking a picture of the craft it was nearly out of sight, so the picture is not that great.
content.summary: Large dark triangle with red and green steady lights

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were outside drinking coffee on the front porch of our house. i looked over to watch the sunset, we'd gone outside to have a cigarette since there's no smoking in the house. it was very bright, either glowing itself or reflecting back the setting sun beneath it, it was far enough away to be difficult to tell. when i first saw it i thought it was probably some kind of plane because it left a trail behind it, though the trail behind it was about 1/4 the length those usually left by such planes as are more commonly seen, so i nudged my mother and gestured to it. it was in the middle of the sky at this point, no clouds around, and out in the wide open. she says 'it's probably just a jet', and in the short time it takes her to say those five words that i looked at her for, i look back and not only is whatever it is gone, so is the entire tail it was leaving behind it in the air. which at the slow speed it was going while leaving the tail would be pretty much physically impossible for it to disappear from the sky along with the stream it left behind it, too. so we look at each other, both of us shiver, and we both decide to go inside. i've seen multiple crafts and even lived in gulf breeze during the ed walters sightings, just blocks away, so i was not particularly frightened, but it was definitely a surprise and somewhat off putting and exciting.
content.summary: Glowing craft above the setting sun winked out, taking a contrail it left with it

content.detailedDescription: 2 globelike ufos moving north. about 300ft at about 30mph. no sound at all. glowing orange in color. 9 months later a neighbor gave us an 8 month old chicken duck.  a creature that does not belong here. since then i have developed skin cancer.
content.summary: 2 orange balls moving north2

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on 695 when i noticed something flying to my left at tree top level. it had matched my speed, about 65 mph, heading north, and abruptly made a 180. i knew then it wasn't an ordinary aircraft. i made a u-turn at the liberty rd. exit and went chasing after it. we almost made it to rt 40 when it started heading north again, so we made another u-turn at rt 40 and again at liberty rd again because it started heading south again. this time it went to howard johnson's parking lot on rt 40 and hovered there till i arrived and got out of my car. i started to walk toward it but, the girls screamed and they said no, don't go there. so i waved to it. the cars and people in the area seemed to be oblivious to what i was looking at. then it flew out over the intersection, rocked back and forth like an airplane when it's waving to you, and headed west. then it was gone within seconds. i had four people with me. they all saw it, but years later they wouldn't talk with me abou it or flat out denied it happened. i really thought it was cool. i was only 19 at the time, but i didn't drink or do drugs. it was a real flying saucer with a dome on top and another on the bottom with what appeared to be two large lights inside it. there were formation lights on the outer edge of the center of the craft. they lit up sequentially all the way around it from left to right. it was gray in color hovering right next to the building no more than 30 or 40 ft off the ground. i was actually standing about 100 ft away from it. there was no way of mistaking what i was looking at.
content.summary: I noticed something to my left as i was driving home on 695. it did a 180 without stopping.

content.detailedDescription:
First spotted a multicolored sphere over his housing complex in october of 2013 in the evening around nine pm 
 
he lives near burbank airport and knows the airplanes and helicopters and knew at once this was a ufo

he has seen the sphere many times since and so has his neighbors 

the sphere appears around the same time whenever he has seen it

the sphere has many colors pulsating and hovers and then moves around and hovers some more and then disappears toward the mountains

the sightings last a couple of hours

he has video and pictures he would share with investigator

his neighbors were shocked when they saw it, but he was facinated
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw muticolored sphere hovering over his housing complex many times

content.detailedDescription: Iwas in my car with my girlfriend and she was the first one to see is. i was looking down at my phone. when i looked up i seen lights over a house it was so close thought i was a toy but the way it moved it was like a bumblebee it was amazing. i don't think i'll ever see that ever again in my life
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I was in my car with my girlfriend and she seen it first when i seen it i pulled out my phone and took a video take a look

content.detailedDescription:
Susan was sitting in a chair on her front porch and saw a bronze colored sphere appear out of the sky and hover and then dark over behind some trees and hover and then dart away
she was excited but didn't know who to call at that time
content.summary: Saw bronze colored sphere appear in the  sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out letting my dog take care of her business when i noticed several bright lights towards the w/northwest direction from my home in buckeye arizona. one light seemed to flash a bright light downward towards the ground.This went off and on for almost 20 - 30 minutes before ending. i did notice several jets possibly milatary (i live not far from luke airforce base) flying towards that direction durring the event.
content.summary: Strange bright lights (one light flashed bright light downward towards ground) west northwest of my home

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting out in the yard looking up as i often do, normally seeing a lot of planes and helicopters (i live close to hollywood blvd, los angeles) noticed and cluster of lights flashing randomly forming the outline of a cigar shape. i did not see a craft, and it didn't appear to be a plane showing no signs of prominent red lights or any lights on wings. all these lights where forming only the outline of a cigar shape, plus it seemed to be very high, maybe 40/50,000 feet and just guessing but possibly 3 to 4 times longer that a boeing jet, and not typically in the flight path that i would normally see a plan. it was moving from east to west, not sure of speed? if i had to guess, maybe 2000mph?? but the most bizarre thing of all that first drew my attention. the angle of the craft was at a 45 degree. not 90 as if it where wings, or straight heading forward, the lights and outline were at a clear 45 degree angle but moving forward, if you understand my meaning? has this been seen before?? please feel free to contact me.  paul 310 701 7112.
i did grab my phone and took two pics but the lights were far by that time and all i see is black.  i can send them if you want.
content.summary: Directly overhead at night sparkling lights randomly flashing in a cigar shape at a 45 degree angle heading west.

content.detailedDescription:
John and his friend were camping in the mountains at about six thousand feet near a gold mine
he and his friend were observing the space station in the night sky when they saw a white light near the space station move erratically and zig zag around the sky
6 hours later he woke up with  bruises on his legs, torso and arms 
the bruises were circular in size about the size of a quarter with a double prong mark inside each bruise   each bruise was strangely perfectly circular he also awoke with leg cramps that lasted 15 min   he is anxious  and believes he was abducted and lost four hours of time 
he was a corpsman in vietnam and has started having flashbacks now
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw lights zig zag in sky  then over tree top

content.detailedDescription:
Going to mail box when she noticed disc shape hovered above trees 
later date observed a capsule with many colored lights that had landed she actually went near to it to see it and claims it made her sick and still years later has health problems
 she felt that the one capsule she went near to  had telepathically called her to come to it

she has observed multiple orbs and star bright objects near her home
her two sons have also observed orbs

she was excited at first but got sick later
content.summary: Capsual with light landed plus  f'ashing orbs  flying

content.detailedDescription:
This past sunday night i was walking a friend to their car after our regular sunday tv night gathering. my wife and i live close to downtown los angeles and i am very familiar with the aircraft that occupy the airspace around our home. we see small planes, helicopters (private, military and law enforcement), airliners (we are in the flight path for lax), the goodyear blimp and the occasional military aircraft. this was not any of those. 
i first spotted the craft by the continuous, non-blinking red light on its nose. then as it began to pass overhead i noticed the bright white lights that would rapidly and sequentially blink down the length of the craft. there three maybe four of these white lights. as they would blink there lights reflected off of the body of the craft. it did not appear to have wings or a  tail. 
this object was very high up. i would guess satellite to space station altitude. 
it moved very rapidly and did not change direction. 
my friend observed this as well, we couldn't decide exactly what it was.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft with continuous red light on nose and rhythmically stroking white lights along the body

content.detailedDescription:
I was was on the phone with a friend who lives n.E. of me in canton. i went out the back door for a cigarette, the back door looks out to the north, and to the right i can see east. half way into smoking i jerked my head to the northeast, because something just seemed to appear. there were 10-20 large green balls all in a perfect straight line, all steady on.. then they started to blink, faster and faster to a strobe, and they all went out at the exact same moment. this was like 3-4 seconds and it was over. it "appeared" to be up to a quarter mile long, in a southwest to northeast line. it might have been as low as 800 feet over the neighborhood.  it was low and right there, and it was scary. 
i told my friend on the phone what it looked like and that took about 5 minutes. then i told him i had to get off the phone and call 911. i went out the front door and i called 911 saying im sure your going to get a lot of calls and told her what i seen. she put me on hold for 1-2 minutes. mean while im looking over the side of the porch where i can also see the east and northeast, and the sky starts flashing low on the horizon in the east/northeast. 911 comes back and says hello? and i said now im seeing flashing low on the horizon.. she said you need to call akron canton airport, look up the number in the phone book. i got off the phone.. the flashing after the ufo made me think something was happening, like the ufo crash or zapped something. i called my friend and asked did you see the sky flashing.. and he did, when i got offthe phone with him to call the police he went outside, and he said the flashing was n.E. of him, and said it must be outside of canton. he thought maybe the power went out, i checked american electrics power website and it showed in stark county 501-2000 people with out power! i did not call the airport, im pretty sure they dont have a numbrr listed to talk to anything but a help desk or something, plus calling 911 was enough.
the 911 call i have on my phone as a record. it was about 7 minutes from the ufo to the power outage in the n.E. and i honestly think the power outage, where ever it was in n.E stark county, is linked to the ufo. it wasnt windy, and it was mostly clear here, and no clouds where the ufo appeared. 
i checked online to see if anything comes up on a search, and i get nothing on a ufo anywhere and notthing about the power outage aep had on the outage map online for stark county.
i know about sky lanters, fireworks, this just appeared and disappeared with out moving, and they all started to strobe at the same time and all out at the same time, it was perfect and i know it wasnt someone causing it, or that it wasnt a natural event. for me this was 100% alien, and not just some light in the sky. 
i dont know for sure on distance, it was close, maybe only visable to the neighborhood.. my house sits up on a hill and i can see everyones roof tops looking east northeast. someone needs to investigate, maybe starting with what caused the outage. i checked at 3am on aeps webite and the power was still listed as out and that was almost 6 hours later!
someone can even come out here to see what part of the sky i was looking at.. i just know this���for sure needs to be investigated.
content.summary: 10-20 green orbs appear steady  on, start flashing to a strobe, disappear

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a huge object which at first thought was a hang glider. it banked right between 2 mountains but didn't come out the other side.  then i thought that was way to big to be a hang glider.  no sound.  i was within feet of the mountain.  sightings seem to be picking up.
content.summary: Huge unknown object within feet of mountain

content.detailedDescription: I was at home talking to my neighbour while he was having a cigarette i noticed a star look  alike shape in bright orange i  knew it wasn't a star thought it was a planet we kept staring at it and when i pointed it out to my neighbour it started to move like hovering movements. i was so surprised to see it i ran in the house to call my wife when we came out it was gone it moved position i found it again it was so scary we ran in closed our doors and shut our lights of.
content.summary: Just call me this is hard to explain

content.detailedDescription: Was having a smoke petting cat on lap watching a plane fly over leaving a trail of so called chem trails. that's when i noticed a cylindrical shape fly just under the trail and stop for less then a minute. it then proceeded straight then hovered again when a passenger plane flew over. it proceeded to get bigger and smaller as ifit was flying back then forth.  at that time it looked like a black dot in the sky then it disappeared. 2 days earlier i saw something that didn't make sense and will file separate report.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched ufo observe chem trail spraying

content.detailedDescription: I came outside for a smoke. looking at the stars i noticed something in motion. hard to see, dark, v-shaped object approaching from the west. it did not have any lights. when it passed almost over head i noticed the shape, size and some detail. i was vey alarmed at what i was seeing. it looked as big as a aircraft carrier but didn't make a sound. i ran inside yelling for my dad but when we got back on the patio it was gone. i want to believe it was a stealth bomber with the lights off. the scary truth is it looked more like a silent flying, v-shape massive mother ship.  the wing span appeared large enough to land planes on it. somebody had to see this besides me. radar should have picked up something that massive. i spent hours outside looking for another sighting.
content.summary: Massive v-shape flying ufo

content.detailedDescription: I am a college student at central michigan university. me and my girlfriend were getting back from eating one evening. it was spring 2010. as we were exiting my truck something caught my eye up in the air approximately 150 feet in the air and about 200 feet away from us. i noticed a small orange/yellowish light moving from east to west. as i focused in on the object i saw more lights (5 or 6) and then my vision panned out and i realized the immense size of this object. it was about half the size of a football field, maybe larger. it was large, silent, and from what i could see it was a square-like craft. i couldn't make out the exact size because the craft was dark and only the lights were visible on the bottom corner of the craft running down its sides. this all happened in a matter of seconds, i then yelled to my girlfriend to look up and she did and gasped and asked me what it was. we watched it for approximately 10 seconds and then the craft disappeared to the west. the size of this craft was insanely large.
content.summary: Giant silent dark craft with lights on it observed by me and my girlfriend

content.detailedDescription:
As a lifetime resident of tucson, az i moved to las vegas, nv in 2008. i drive 6-10 times year to and from since 2008 and have drove this route nv and az hwy 93 from las vegas to az and merge into the phoenix az area on the loop 101.  

i am a 39 year old former us marine and have seen every type of aircraft and training excursuses in my lifetime. i know the difference between aircraft, both military and civilian, and have seen tactical training flares and firing. i have heard numerous stories and have always wanted to see "ufos" but never have until wednesday, march13th 2014 at 740pm pst at mile post 113 on hwy 93 heading south toward phoenix.

as the sky was just becoming dark a glowing amber orb appeared suddenly in my driving path above the mountain silhouette approximately 200-500 ft above the mountains. as suddenly as it appeared the exact type orb/object appeared from left to right in sequence about a second or less apart from each other in the exact and precise distance from each other , totally five perfectly level orbs glowing amber in color.

as they all were lit in less than 3 seconds or sighting the first orb they all suddenly disappeared or shut off simultaneously. i looked to the road as i was traveling at aprox 80 mph. as soon as i looked up in the direction of the lights the 2 outside light lit simultaneously and then the 3 in between turned back-on in sequence in less than 2 seconds. then as they all were lit they all shut off and disappeared. i saw no objects in their place nor craft or aircraft body they were attached to. it was overcast haze but not clouds like a dark dust az night darker than usual do to the overcast haze dust cloud mixture this night. as i was on a winding az hwy that twisted and turned i could not continuously watch but stayed vigilant and never say them that night or again.

today i showed a friend what they looked like by goggling and you tubing  "the phoenix lights" and they were exactly the same as the phonix lights from 1994 and what startled me most was that the sighting was exactly march 13th to the very day!  i know what i saw and what i was looking at. no light tower or cell tower or air craft or flares nor stars. this was a organized formation of intelligence and if was one object must have been 1/2 a mile to 1 mile in width.  hope this helps other sightings or supports actual witnesses who may have seen what i witnessed and experienced. 

end of statement - rjc
content.summary: Just like the phoenix lights, 5 yellow orange orbs, perfect straight line on horizon, exact distance apart
